attributes.action: Help Those in a FIXED RATE MORTGAGE to Save their Homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The interest going down is not helping any of us of Fixed Rate Mortgages. I suspect when the fall out finishes those of us with Fixed Rates will the one who have lost their homes. This government should legislate to ensure that all mortgages (fixed rate)are reduced by 1.5% .
